benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: GET /1.0/kb/accounts/{accountId}/payments - Retrieve account payments

covered: Happy path and core retrieval: TC01 (basic) and TC07 (all query parameters).
Plugin filter and pluginProperty: TC04, TC16, TC17, TC19.
Error and edge cases: TC10 (invalid accountId), TC18 (invalid audit), TC11/TC12 (auth errors), TC13 (service down), TC14 (unsupported parameter).
Regression and compatibility: TC21, TC22, TC25.
gaps: Pagination: No tests covering pagination and page-based retrieval for large datasets.
Rate Limiting: No tests for throttling or rate limits.
Caching: No tests for ETag/Cache-Control headers.
Authorization breadth: No 403 scenario or role-based access test.
Comprehensive input validation: Additional invalid pluginProperty values beyond injection (e.g., invalid tokens) and type mismatches in pluginProperty, or length validation.
recommendations: Add pagination tests (page/size parameters; link headers).
Add 403 access tests for insufficient permissions.
Add more input validation tests for pluginProperty (special characters, length).
Stress test with thousands of concurrent requests (beyond 25).
Test for timeouts with slower network; verify fault tolerance.
